name: No More Blonds
description:
stupid blonds?

Now you can create even more stupid blondes! Shoot with a hairy bullet to the scientific girls and fill the world with brainless glamour!

A coconut-cocktail-FPS from our team:

Maria Smirnova: Game Designer, Game Developer, Project Manager

Andrea Antonio Perrelli: Game Developer

Gianluca Grosso: Game Artist, Game Designer

Antonio Giulio Mele: Game Artist, Game Designer
